channel.title: I am legend
channel.description:
Well, after seeing the previews every time I watched TV I decided that it was necessary to go see the movie, I am Legend. It is the new Will Smith movie and I have to say it was pretty decent in quality.
Will Smith portrays a man who stays behind in New York after it has been quarantined because of the "KV Virus." The virus is created when a cure for cancer mutates killing nearly everyone who has been "cured." The virus becomes airborne killing most of the population and changing the rest into monsters of sorts. These monsters are described as being in an advanced rabies like state, they only come out at night and pretty much attack anything that moves. Will Smith's character, Robert Neville, and his dog Samantha "Sam", are the only sane survivors in New York. Robert chose to stay behind to try to develop a cure for the KV Virus.
[Spoiler Warning: Skip the next paragraph if you don't want the ending ruined for you]
[size=7pt]I have to say there has never been a movie that has been emotional enough to make me cry, but this movie did succeed in doing so. The part that made me cry is when Robert basically goes off the deep end putting him and his dog in danger and resulting in Sam getting infected. He rushes her back to his lab and tries everything he can to save her, however, holding her in his arms she starts trying to bite him and her fur starts to fall out. He restrains her and eventually ends up having to strangle her to death. This causes Robert to snap, he goes out after dark and tries to kill many of the infected and almost dies himself until he is rescued by two other survivors, Anna and Ethan. Anna and Ethan are survivors from Maryland that had heard Roberts radio message. You find out that the infected followed them back to Roberts house and attack, this causes Robert, Anna, and Ethan to become corned in the lab and in a final act of self sacrifice Robert saves Anna and Ethan. He hands Anna a vial full of blood and says "The cure is in her blood". He than kills himself and all the other infected in the lab using a hand grenade. Quite heart touching, eh?[/size]
[/Spoiler]
I'd give this movie a 9/10.

item.title: I am legend
item.dc:creator: @Tree Tree
item.description:
@Tree wrote:

Horrible movie. Don’t even bother to go watch it or even rent it. Here is the storyline:

[spoilers]

- Drive expensive car.
- Hunt deer
- Go home
- Eat dinner
- Go Deer hunting
- Look at infected rats
- Wait for people
- Deer hunting
- Goes to lab
- Look for food
- Deer hunting
- Dog dies
- Main characters goes suicidal and crashes his car
- Main character gets rescued (what are the chances *Rolls eyes*)
- Two new characters
- Two new characters fuck everything up
- 'Night Seekers' attack
- Will smith sacrifices himself to save his cure!
- Two other characters find more survivors.
- The end.

[/spoilers]

There are a few reasons this is horrible.

  1. No real action.
  2. All Night Seekers look the same imo (No kids?)
  3. No real reason to create the ‘cure’. 90 percent were dead and a lot more were eaten.
  4. No resolution.
  5. No nudity. Every good Survival movie has nudity.

A movie with no resolution equals a fail. This may have been as bad a 28 days later where the whole movie turned to shit at the end, almost like the movies script writers had gone “Fuck it!”. Waste of my time.

btw Will Smith didn’t do that bad. Good acting imo.

Read full topic

item.title: I am legend
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

I watched it yesterday. I didn’t expect it to be that great because I’d heard mixed reviews.

I gotta totally agree with what was said above about the ending and how he could have got in the safe with them by throwing the frag through a hole in the glass. Nevertheless I did enjoy the ending.

It made me laugh, it made me cry, it made me scared…

There are spoilers below so i decided to make them small, they outline why i said what i did above.

[size=4pt]
It made me laugh so much when the manakin some how moved (I’m not sure how actually, i think i missed why that happened) but it made me laugh at wills reaction to this.

It made me cry when of course he had to kill his only friend left - his dog.

It made me scared when will had to go through pitch black to find his dog and then when he moved the light he was holding he realized the infected were right there close to him.[/size]

Read full topic
